name: Customer Support
description: Help users troubleshoot issues and find solutions

messages.text: Hi there! I'm here to help you with any issues you're experiencing.
What type of problem are you having today?
CHOICES
I understand how frustrating startup issues can be. Let's troubleshoot this step by step.
First, have you tried restarting your device completely?
CHOICES
Let's check if you have the latest version. Please update the app from your app store.
Please restart your device and try opening the app again. This fixes most startup issues!
If updating doesn't help, try clearing the app's cache or reinstalling it.
Login issues can be tricky. Let's figure out what's happening.
Are you getting an error message when you try to log in?
CHOICES
Double-check your username and password. If you're sure they're correct, try resetting your password.
Check your internet connection. Try switching between WiFi and mobile data to see if that helps.
If the app freezes during login, try force-closing and reopening it, or restart your device.
I'd like to help you with that feature. Which feature isn't working properly?
messages.placeholderText: Describe the feature that's not working...

messages.text: Thanks for letting me know about the issue with {support.broken_feature|that feature}.
Can you describe what happens when you try to use it?
messages.placeholderText: What exactly happens when you try to use it?

messages.text: I see. That behavior with {support.broken_feature|the feature} sounds unusual.
Try logging out and back in, or updating the app. If it persists, our team will investigate.
I'm here to help with any issue! Please describe what's happening:
Thank you for the detailed description. Let me see how I can help with that.
Based on what you've described, here are some general troubleshooting steps:

1. Restart the app
2. Check for updates
3. Restart your device
4. Contact our support team if the issue persists
Did this help resolve your issue?
CHOICES
Wonderful! I'm glad we could get that sorted out for you.
If you run into any other issues, don't hesitate to reach out. We're always here to help!
I'm sorry the issue persists. Let me connect you with our technical support team for further assistance.
They'll be able to provide more specialized help. You can reach them through the 'Contact Support' option in settings.
Thank you for your patience, and we'll get this resolved for you soon!
